course_description:
Jr/Sr Colloquium.
This course explores the history of Germany after 1945, paying special attention to the circumstances under which two independent German states emerged and how they developed diverging societies and independent policies during the Cold War.
sections: Class Nbr: 3890, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: A. Eckert, Status: Open
